actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to raise the loan level to 90 per centum of parity any commodity that the commercial export sales are suspended for any reason.

summary.text: Emergency Embargo Protection Act of 1980 - Amends the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to set the loan level at 90 percent of the parity price for any specified agricultural commodities in which export sales have been suspended (presently such loan levels are set only when export sales are suspended due to short supplies).

titles.title: A bill to raise the loan level to 90 per centum of parity any commodity that the commercial export sales are suspended for any reason.
